detectors.name: Account Abstraction Takeover Vulnerability
detectors.description: Detects vulnerabilities allowing EntryPoint replacement attacks and full account takeover in ERC-4337 wallets

detectors.name: AA Nonce Management Vulnerabilities
detectors.description: Detects improper nonce management causing parallel operation failures and transaction collisions

detectors.name: AA Paymaster Fund Drain
detectors.description: Detects paymaster sponsorship abuse that can drain paymaster funds

detectors.name: Session Key Vulnerabilities
detectors.description: Detects overly permissive session keys, missing expiration, and scope limit issues

detectors.name: Social Recovery Attacks
detectors.description: Detects insufficient guardian thresholds, missing timelock delays, and recovery manipulation risks

detectors.name: Allowance Toctou
detectors.description: Detects allowance toctou vulnerabilities

detectors.name: Bridge Message Verification
detectors.description: Detects missing message verification in bridge contracts

detectors.name: Bridge Token Minting Control
detectors.description: Detects unsafe token minting in bridge contracts

detectors.name: Classic Reentrancy
detectors.description: State changes after external calls enable reentrancy attacks

detectors.name: Commit-Reveal Timing
detectors.description: Detects commit-reveal schemes with timing vulnerabilities such as insufficient delays or missing time bounds

detectors.name: Constructor Reentrancy
detectors.description: Detects external calls in constructors that can enable reentrancy before security mechanisms are fully initialized

detectors.name: CREATE2 Salt Front-running
detectors.description: Detects predictable CREATE2 salts enabling deployment front-running attacks

detectors.name: Cross-Chain Replay Attack
detectors.description: Detects signature/hash generation missing chain ID, enabling replay attacks across chains

detectors.name: Yield Farming Exploits
detectors.description: Detects missing deposit/withdrawal fee validation, reward calculation errors, and share price manipulation

detectors.name: Delegatecall Return Value Ignored
detectors.description: Detects delegatecall operations without proper return value checking

detectors.name: Delegatecall to Untrusted Library
detectors.description: Detects delegatecall to mutable library addresses that can be changed after deployment

detectors.name: Delegation Loop Vulnerability
detectors.description: Detects governance delegation without circular delegation protection, enabling vote manipulation

detectors.name: EIP-7702 Delegate Access Control
detectors.description: Detects missing authorization in delegate execution functions allowing arbitrary calls

detectors.name: Governance Attacks
detectors.description: Detects vulnerabilities in DAO governance mechanisms including flash loan attacks, delegation loops, and voting manipulation

detectors.name: ERC-20 Approve Race Condition
detectors.description: Detects ERC-20 approve functions vulnerable to front-running race conditions (SWC-114)

detectors.name: ERC-4337 Paymaster Abuse
detectors.description: Detects unlimited sponsorship, missing gas validation, and spending limit issues in paymasters

detectors.name: Erc7821 Batch Authorization
detectors.description: Detects erc7821 batch authorization vulnerabilities

detectors.name: Fallback Delegatecall Unprotected
detectors.description: Detects fallback delegatecall unprotected vulnerabilities

detectors.name: Flash Loan Collateral Swap
detectors.description: Detects flash loan manipulation of collateral ratios

detectors.name: Flash Loan Price Manipulation Advanced
detectors.description: Detects multi-protocol price manipulation using flash loans

detectors.name: Guardian Role Centralization
detectors.description: Detects guardian/emergency roles with excessive power creating centralization risks

detectors.name: Hook-Based Reentrancy Enhanced
detectors.description: Detects reentrancy vulnerabilities in Uniswap V4 hooks and similar callback systems where external calls in hooks can re-enter the contract

detectors.name: LRT Share Inflation Attack
detectors.description: Detects ERC-4626-style first depositor attacks in liquid restaking tokens where attackers can steal deposits

detectors.name: Metamorphic Contract Risk
detectors.description: Detects CREATE2 + SELFDESTRUCT patterns enabling bytecode mutation at the same address

detectors.name: MEV Extractable Value
detectors.description: Detects contracts with extractable MEV through front-running, back-running, or transaction ordering manipulation

detectors.name: MEV Priority Gas Auction
detectors.description: Detects PGA-vulnerable functions causing gas wars

detectors.name: Missing Chain-ID Validation
detectors.description: Detects missing chain-ID validation in bridge message processing

detectors.name: Missing Slippage Protection
detectors.description: Detects DEX trades executed without minimum output amount protection, enabling sandwich attacks

detectors.name: Missing Transaction Deadline
detectors.description: Detects missing transaction deadline vulnerabilities

detectors.name: Multi-Signature Bypass Detection
detectors.description: Detects multi-signature systems with flawed signature verification that allows threshold bypass, signature reuse, or owner manipulation

detectors.name: Nonce Reuse Vulnerability
detectors.description: Detects improper nonce management that allows replay attacks or transaction reordering

detectors.name: Oracle Staleness Heartbeat
detectors.description: Detects missing Chainlink heartbeat and staleness checks

detectors.name: Proxy Storage Collision
detectors.description: Detects proxy storage collision vulnerabilities

detectors.name: Read-Only Reentrancy
detectors.description: Read-only functions may be vulnerable to view reentrancy

detectors.name: Restaking Slashing Conditions Bypass
detectors.description: Detects missing slashing protection, improper penalty calculation, and compound slashing risks

detectors.name: Restaking Withdrawal Delays Not Enforced
detectors.description: Detects missing withdrawal delay enforcement, queue manipulation, and liquidity lock vulnerabilities

detectors.name: Selfdestruct Abuse
detectors.description: Detects selfdestruct abuse vulnerabilities

detectors.name: Governance Attacks
detectors.description: Detects vulnerabilities in DAO governance mechanisms including flash loan attacks, delegation loops, and voting manipulation

detectors.name: Slashing Mechanism Vulnerability
detectors.description: Detects vulnerabilities in validator slashing mechanisms that can lead to unfair penalties or griefing attacks

detectors.name: Token Permit Front-Running
detectors.description: Detects ERC-2612 permit griefing and front-running vulnerabilities

detectors.name: Transient Storage Composability Issues
detectors.description: Detects multi-call and composability issues with transient storage that may break atomic operations

detectors.name: Transient Storage Reentrancy
detectors.description: Detects low-gas reentrancy via EIP-1153 transient storage breaking transfer()/send() safety assumptions

detectors.name: tx.origin Authentication
detectors.description: Detects use of tx.origin for authentication/authorization which is vulnerable to phishing attacks

detectors.name: Unchecked External Call
detectors.description: External calls without return value checking

detectors.name: Unchecked Math Operations
detectors.description: Detects arithmetic operations in unchecked blocks that can overflow or underflow without reversion

detectors.name: Upgradeable Proxy Issues
detectors.description: Detects vulnerabilities in upgradeable proxy patterns including storage collisions, initialization issues, and unsafe upgrades

detectors.name: Vault Donation Attack
detectors.description: Detects ERC4626 vaults vulnerable to price manipulation via direct token donations

detectors.name: Vault Fee Manipulation
detectors.description: Detects ERC4626 vaults vulnerable to fee parameter front-running and manipulation attacks

detectors.name: Vault Hook Reentrancy
detectors.description: Detects ERC4626 vaults vulnerable to reentrancy attacks via ERC-777/ERC-1363 token callback hooks

detectors.name: Vault Share Inflation Attack
detectors.description: Detects ERC4626 vault implementations vulnerable to share price manipulation by first depositor

detectors.name: Vault Withdrawal DOS
detectors.description: Detects ERC4626 vaults vulnerable to withdrawal denial-of-service attacks via queue manipulation or liquidity locks

detectors.name: ZK Proof Verification Bypass
detectors.description: Detects missing or incomplete ZK proof verification in rollup contracts, including proof replay vulnerabilities, public input manipulation, and batch submission without proper verification

detectors.name: ZK Proof Malleability
detectors.description: Detects proof malleability attacks in ZK systems

detectors.name: ZK Recursive Proof Validation
detectors.description: Detects recursive proof validation issues

detectors.name: ZK Trusted Setup Bypass
detectors.description: Detects compromised trusted setup validation

detectors.name: Chainlink Stale Price Feed
detectors.description: Detects Chainlink latestRoundData() calls without staleness checks on updatedAt timestamp

detectors.name: Chainlink L2 Sequencer Check
detectors.description: Detects L2 Chainlink usage without Sequencer Uptime Feed validation

detectors.name: Oracle Single Source Reliance
detectors.description: Detects price reliance on a single oracle without fallback mechanism

detectors.name: TWAP Manipulation Window
detectors.description: Detects TWAP oracles with short observation windows vulnerable to price manipulation

detectors.name: Oracle Decimal Mismatch
detectors.description: Detects price feed usage without decimals() normalization causing arithmetic errors

detectors.name: L2 msg.value in Loop
detectors.description: Detects msg.value used inside loops on L2 chains where it can lead to double-counting

detectors.name: L2 Block Number Assumption
detectors.description: Detects block.number used for timing assumptions that are unreliable on L2 rollups

detectors.name: L2 Gas Price Dependency
detectors.description: Detects tx.gasprice or block.basefee used in contract logic where L2 gas models differ from L1

detectors.name: L2 PUSH0 Cross-Deploy Risk
detectors.description: Detects contracts using PUSH0 opcode targeting chains that may not support it

detectors.name: Missing NatSpec Documentation
detectors.description: Detects public and external functions without NatSpec documentation comments

detectors.name: Unused Import
detectors.description: Detects imported contracts or libraries that are not referenced in the source file

detectors.name: Magic Number
detectors.description: Detects hardcoded numeric constants that should be replaced with named constants for readability

detectors.name: Function Too Long
detectors.description: Detects functions exceeding 50 lines which may indicate excessive complexity

detectors.name: Excessive Inheritance
detectors.description: Detects contracts inheriting from more than 5 contracts, indicating potential complexity issues
